div.p: This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/CodeSystem/C4BBClaimDiagnosisType defines the following codes:

tr.td: Required when an external cause of injury is needed to describe the injury
Identifies the patient's reason for the outpatient institutional visit
Required when other conditions coexist or develop subsequently during the treatment
Required when necessary to report additional diagnoses on professional and non-clinician claims

description.value: Indicates if the institutional diagnosis is admitting, principal, secondary, other, an external cause of injury or a patient reason for visit. Complements http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/ex-diagnosistype.
